name: Scandic Kuopio

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: average hotel, in need of a little modernisation but i've seen worse hotel decor crimes committed.
reviews.title: Air conditioning a must!
Kuopio Scandic Hotel
reviews.text: biggest gripe was the lack of air conditioning. we were told this was the hottest summer in finland in memory and they've never needed air con before. our room was a veritable sauna and i had to ask reception for a 2nd fan which just moved the hot air around the room a bit faster. windows were small & ineffectual and we didn't sleep a wink. ordinarily i would have kicked up a fuss at reception but we were too tired and too anxious to get some sleep elsewhere that we didn't bother. in my opinion the heat was so bad to be considered a health risk - i'm a healthy 33 year old and found the heat debilitating. hate to think how the bus full of senior citizens fared during their stay.
heat aside; breakfast good, location good, short walk to lovely beer terraces and centre. ask for a room with a view of the lake.
